summary:
Headline:
AMD delivered solid Q2 2024 results with 8% revenue growth year-over-year, driven by strong demand in data center and client processor segments. Gross margins improved notably, and operating expenses were reduced, supporting profitability.

Growth & revenue drivers:
- Revenue increased 8% YoY.
- Growth primarily fueled by data center and client processor demand.

Margins / profitability:
- Gross margin expanded by 120 basis points, attributed to a favorable product mix.
- Operating expenses decreased 4%, reflecting ongoing efforts to streamline headcount and marketing spend.

Guidance & outlook:
- Full-year revenue guidance raised to mid-teens percentage growth.
- Expectation of further margin expansion in the second half of the fiscal year.

Risks / watchpoints:
- No specific risks or headwinds mentioned in the remarks.
- Monitor execution on cost controls and sustaining product demand to meet raised guidance.
